How To Play

1. You need to choose what you want to cook.
 2. After you choose what you want to cook, you can see the general recipe of that food and you have to memorize that recipe based on decided time.
 3. You can choose the cooking ingredients from the grocery for a limited time.
 4. After finish choosing the ingredients, you can choose the method for cooking that food.
 5. For the will display the result and score of your food, if your score below 70 then you play it again until you get higher score then 71.
 6. Enjoy the game :)
